author: intrepid42
body:
This Pythia8 hook is a C++ port of the alternative hook-based algorithm by Jezo et. al. (arXiv:1607.04538, Appendix B.2) for showering Powheg ttb_NLO_dec and b_bbar_4l processes.

Caveats:
- While the authors found quite good agreement with the reference algorithm, some modifications will be necessary in the future to get complete agreement
- The hook might not be compatible yet with the emission veto hook that we normally use for Powheg+Pythia8.
title: First version of PowhegResHook
